summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Team Meultra Battle Arena game. All backend APIs working perfectly (18/18 tests passed). Frontend UI and game mechanics fully functional with pixel art retro aesthetic. Canvas-based combat system operational with WASD movement, click shooting, and special abilities. All major features tested successfully.
passed_tests: Character selection with 11 characters (8 main + 3 DLC)
DLC locking mechanism working correctly (disabled until level 10)
Map selection with 4 themed maps and difficulty levels
Canvas-based game arena with proper rendering
Game HUD displaying health, score, enemies, time
Achievement system with 10 achievements and filtering
Shop system with items and weapons tabs
Pixel art retro aesthetic with neon colors
